'''0.0.19a'''<ref name="blog">{{link |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160603021730/https://notch.tumblr.com/post/126684752/client-0019a-is-up-a-server-update-is-required|title=Client 0.0.19a is up, a server update is required |date=June 20, 2009, 22:39:41 UTC |website=The Word of Notch}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released alongside server version [[Classic server 1.5|1.5]] on June 19, 2009, at 22:35 UTC, which added sponge and glass.<ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P5:35:47 * Notch changes topic to 'http://www.minecraft.net/  |  Client 0.0.19a is up, a server update is required!'<nowiki/>''" (22:35:47 UTC)</ref>

== Additions ==<!--Please do NOT add a additions table here-->
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Glass JE1.png|32px]] [[Glass]]'''<ref name="blog"/>
* Glass is textured, but is semi-transparent.<ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P5:42:40 <Syndlig> Make the background color on the grass (the gray/white) empty [...] And then make the streaks 50% opaque''" [...] "''P6:00:20 <UBOA> remove the pixel lines and windows would be perfect''" (23:00 UTC)</ref> 
** [[File:Glass (inventory) JE1.jpg|32px]] It does not render in the hotbar and when underwater.<ref>[[#6/20 logs|June 20 IRC logs]]: "''A5:48:22 <Snowman> the old glass looked better [...] but [...] it was invisible under water''"</ref>

'''[[File:Sponge JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Sponge]]'''<ref name="blog"/>
* Used to dry up a 5-block-wide area of water or lava around the sponge, 2 blocks to each side of it.<ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P5:40:07 <wingboy> whats the area the sponge defloods?''" [...] "''P5:40:13 <Notch> wingboy, 5^3''" (22:40 UTC)</ref><ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P5:56:56 <Droqen> Notch: Sponge doesn't take lava away but it stops it from flowing into the area :D''" (20:56 UTC)</ref>
* Disappears after a while.<ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P5:39:42 <Tiralmo> Spange dissappears after a time period?''" [...] "''P5:39:48 <Notch> yes, it "dries out". ;)''" (20:39 UTC)</ref>

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[File:Hotbar.png|200px]] [[Hotbar]]'''<ref name="blog"/>
* Visually displays available blocks.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Cobblestone JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cobblestone]]'''
* Removed from the hotbar because of a lack of space.<ref>{{ytl|PjPooQwvN6M}}</ref><ref name="blog"/><ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P5:38:29 <Notch> NaiiveMelody: They didn't fit in the inventory. They will come back in the next update''" (22:33:29 UTC)</ref>

'''[[File:Lava JE4.png|32px]] [[Lava]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Lava JE3.png|32px]].
** Now have animated, and slightly different textures.

'''[[File:Sand JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Sand]]'''
* Removed from the hotbar because of a lack of space.<ref>ㅤ</ref><ref name="blog"/><ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P5:38:29 <Notch> NaiiveMelody: They didn't fit in the inventory. They will come back in the next update''" (22:33:29 UTC)</ref>

'''[[File:Water JE3.png|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Water JE2.png|32px]].
** Now have animated, and slightly different textures. However, water outside of the world border keeps the old texture.<ref name="blog"/><ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P5:39:20 <wingboy> notch new lava is awesome''" [...] "''P5:39:54 <Evil-Ville> New water looks nice''" [...] "''P5:41:55 <Droqen> Whoa, water animation o_o''" [...] "''P5:46:06 <Droqen> Water is animated''" (22:39 to 22:46 UTC)</ref>

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* Generating a new level while on a server, or saving the server level, no longer works.

== Technical ==
=== General ===
* Limited frame rate to 100 fps, however, it causes problems in later versions.<ref name="blog"/>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed a client crash bug in chat.{{cn}}

== Bugs ==
'''7 bugs reported'''
* Sponges sometimes do not soak up water when placed and removed in certain ways, especially when water can flow in from above.<ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P5:43:30 <peerkoel> here's a glitch: build two sponges deep underwater next to each other, delete one, it all floods''" [...] "''P5:44:03 <Droqen> Water can fall into a sponged area if you remove a block from where it would fall into''" [...] "''P5:45:00 <wingboy> water just filled in around my sponge :P''" [...] "''P6:00:40 <liq3> OH I see. Make sure thehre's a level of water above both sponges and it'll flood the remaining one.''" (22:43 to 22:45 UTC)</ref>
* Water cannot be seen through glass.<ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P5:48:51 <wingboy> water cant be seen through glass :P''" (22:48:51 UTC)</ref>
* Glass cannot be seen through water.<ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P5:45:04 <Tiralmo> I like how you can't see underwater glass from above''" (22:45:04 UTC)</ref>
* Glass is invisible in darkness.<ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P5:48:20 <peerkoel> hm, glass is totally invisible if it's underground, hard to find my glass bunker''" (22:48 UTC)</ref>
* Water has Z-fighting issues.<ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P6:19:54 <liq3> Notch: will the new texture stop z-fighting with water on the sides?''" [...] "''P6:44:07 <LKA> water has lines between each tile, now?''" (June 19, 23:19 UTC)</ref>
* Mobs have backwards heads.<ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P6:02:45 <greenslimy> mob's heads are backwards! XDD''" (06:02 UTC)</ref>
* Pressing pick-block on sand switches to glass<ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P6:11:09 <PuyoDead> kinda funny, middle clicking tan sand gives you glass, heh''" (06:11 UTC)</ref> and using it on cobblestone switches to sponge.
